## R Markdown

```{r}
library(spData)
library(sf)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

lnd_point = st_point(c(18, 53))                 # sfg object
lnd_geom = st_sfc(lnd_point, crs = 4326)           # sfc object
lnd_attrib = data.frame(                           # data.frame object 
  name = "Toru≈Ñ", 
  temperature = 8,
  date = as.Date("2020-04-25"))
lnd_sf = st_sf(lnd_attrib, geometry = lnd_geom)    # sf object
lnd_sf

ggplot() + 
  geom_sf(data = world) +
  geom_sf(data = lnd_sf)
```
